EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Define Segments for Einstein Personalization

You can define real-time segments based on customer interactions to deliver immediate responses. For example, use segments to assess user engagement in real time to segment customers based on interests and preferences. You can also define standard segments for use in determining what products you want to recommend to individuals. For example, you can exclude products that users have purchased in the last 15 days from a recommendation list.

Using Segmentation With Einstein Personalization
Use segmentation to break down your data into useful segments to understand, target, and analyze website and app end users.
Example: Create Segments for Einstein Personalization
You can create standard or real-time segments for use by Einstein Personalization in decision targeting.
